actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Local Public Works Capital Development and Investment Act of 1976 relating to periods of unemployment.

summary.text: Amends the Local Public Works Capital Development and Investment Act of 1976 to revise the critera under which States and local governments are to be given priority in making public works grants during periods when the national unemployment rate exceeds six and one-half percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Local Public Works Capital Development and Investment Act of 1976 relating to periods of unemployment.
